column17:
You may delay but time will not. So keep this timepiece from Madison close to you to avoid being late. It comes with pink silicone rubber bracelet with case diameter of 40mm. It features pink polycarbonate case pink dial uni-directional rotating bezel luminescent hands and markers crystal scratch resistant mineral clasp tang calendar and date display and solid case back. It is water resistant upto 50 meters.

Features
  • For: Unisex
  • Type: Analog
  • Usage: Fashion/Casual
  • Band/Strap: Pink Silicone Rubber Bracelet
  • Dial: Pink
  • Case Material: Pink Polycarbonate
  • Case Diameter: 40mm
  • Water Resistance: 50 meters
  • Movement: Quartz
  • Other Features: Uni-directional Rotating Bezel Luminiscents Hands and Markers Crystal Scratch Resistant Mineral Clasp Tang Calendar and Date display Solid Case Back

Care Tips Clean your watch at least twice a week with a soft dry cloth. Avoid direct contact with solvents detergents perfumes cosmetics alcohols etc. Remove your watch before you lift heavy objects or do any heavy physical work.
